column1: Petitioners  to  this  application  are  two  trade  unions  and  some  members

of  the  said  unions  of  the  1st  Respondent  Board. 
In  their  petition  they
alleged that the  1 st  Respondent Board by an impugned decision reflected
in documents produced marked P-17(a)  to P-17( e)  decided to promote all

Engineers from  Board Grade 6  (MM 1-1)  to  Board Grade  5  (MM  1-1) 
and
